name: Dottie Flower
summary: Dottie Flowers is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) game created by the indie developer Goldlocke. This charming platformer was released as a physical cartridge for the SNES/Super Famicom, with no digital version available

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
videos.title: New SNES game: Dottie Flowers - 60fps Gameplay!
